page.title: 09Recreation
page.content: {Oakwell Hall}is about 400 years old.A family called Batt used to own the Hall and lived there for 100 years. Many people have lived in the Hall since then.About 50 years ago two men bought the Hall and gave it to the Council to save it from being demolished. Occasionally there are plays about the past of Oakwell Hall.Sometimes school children go to the Hall and live for a day in the life of 17th Century people.They wear the same clothes and eat the same food. The land surrounding the Hall is now a Country Park. {Oakwell Country Park}which covers 87 acres surrounding Oakwell Hall is an interesting place for all visitors 63, 000 people visited the Park in 1984.
